page.title: 17WARDLE SCOUTS
page.content: Every Wednesday I go to a group at the top of the village.It is called scouts.It starts at 7.30p.m.and ends at 9.30p.m.to 10.00p.m. We play lots of games.One of the games is called 'murder ball'.To play it you have to have a large space, a ball, two teams and a piece of chalk. Mark an area for the pitch_ draw two circles,one on each side,then a person throws a ball in the middle and each team has to try and get the ball in the other team's circle. We also do a lot of activities like canoeing and hiking. Every year we go to about three camps. In August we go on a one weeks camp. At the camp we sleep under canvas and we go water skiing, canoeing, absailing, hiking and quite often we go rockclimbing.
